wrapScienceJ.wrapImaJ.core.histogram

Interface Histogram

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HistogramThresholding
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HistogramBaseGeneric, HistogramIJ

    public interface Histogram
    The Histogram class manages basic routines about image histograms. Such a histogram basically stores, for each grey level, the number of voxels (or pixels) un the image with this gray level as value. These values are stored in an array with length the number of possible gray levels (typically 256 for one byte gray levels). The class performs operations such as equalization, brightness enhancement, etc. the class performs efficient calculations for average gray level of an image.
    Author:
    Remy Malgoures

        Duplicates the histogram (invocation of the operation)
        Returns:
        a reference to a clone copy of this instance.

      • getLength

        int getLength()
        Returns:
        the length (number of values) of the histogram.

      • getValue

        long getValue(int grayLevel)
        Parameters:
        grayLevel - index (i.e. a given gray level)
        Returns:
        the ith value in the histogram (i.e. number of voxels with this color)

      • setValue

        void setValue(int grayLevel,
              long value)
        sets the ith value in the histogram (i.e. number of voxels with this color)
        Parameters:
        grayLevel - index (i.e. a given gray level)
        value - the value to use for the i^th element in the histogram.

      • incrementValue

        void incrementValue(int i)
        increments a value in the histogram from its index.
        Parameters:
        i - index (i.e. a given gray level)

      • writeToFile

        void writeToFile(java.lang.String destinationFilePath)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the histogram to a file on disk.
        Parameters:
        destinationFilePath - the path to a file on disk where to save the histogram data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of disk write failure (e.g. unknown directory or permission denied)

      • readFromFile

        void readFromFile(java.lang.String sourceFilePath)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the histogram from a text file with decimal encoded values into this instance. The file must contain nothing else than one integer value per line Each of these values is meant to be a value in the produced histogram.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - Path to a text file with the histogram values
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a disk read error occurs

      • getGrayLevelAverage

        double getGrayLevelAverage()
        Computes the average grey level value of the image.
        Returns:
        the average grey level value.

      • getGrayLevelStandardDeviation

        double getGrayLevelStandardDeviation()
        Computes the standard deviation grey level value of the image.
        Returns:
        the standard deviation grey level values.

      • getBinarizationThreshold

        int getBinarizationThreshold(ThresholdingOption method)
        Computes the grey level threshold value for binarizing an image using this instance's histogram. Different method can be used to compute the threshold.
        Parameters:
        method - the thresholding method
        Returns:
        the threshold for the image
